types:type.name: employeeData
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type employeeData = Array<{| first_name: String, last_name: String, company_name: String, address: String, city: String, county: String, state: String, zip: String, phone1: String, phone2: String, email: String, web: String |}> {"MetadataFormat": "csv"}

types:type.name: oneInsert
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type oneInsert = {| eid: String, first_name: String, last_name: String, company_name: String, address: String, city: String, county: String, state: String, zip: Number {"typeId": "int"}, phone1: String, phone2: String, email: String, web: String |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"eid\":\"1\",\"first_name\":\"James\",\"last_name\":\"Butt\",\"company_name\":\"Benton, John B Jr\",\"address\":\"6649 N Blue Gum St\",\"city\":\"New Orleans\",\"county\":\"Orleans\",\"state\":\"LA\",\"zip\":70116,\"phone1\":\"504-621-8927\",\"phone2\":\"504-845-1427\",\"email\":\"jbutt@gmail.com\",\"web\":\"http:\/\/www.bentonjohnbjr.com\"}"}

types:type.name: employeeJSONexample
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type employeeJSONexample = Array<{| eid: String, first_name: String, last_name: String, company_name: String, address: String, city: String, county: String, state: String, zip: Number {"typeId": "int"}, phone1: String, phone2: String, email: String, web: String |}> {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "[{\"eid\":\"1\",\"first_name\":\"James\",\"last_name\":\"Butt\",\"company_name\":\"Benton, John B Jr\",\"address\":\"6649 N Blue Gum St\",\"city\":\"New Orleans\",\"county\":\"Orleans\",\"state\":\"LA\",\"zip\":70116,\"phone1\":\"504-621-8927\",\"phone2\":\"504-845-1427\",\"email\":\"jbutt@gmail.com\",\"web\":\"http:\/\/www.bentonjohnbjr.com\"},{\"eid\":\"2\",\"first_name\":\"Josephine\",\"last_name\":\"Darakjy\",\"company_name\":\"Chanay, Jeffrey A Esq\",\"address\":\"4 B Blue Ridge Blvd\",\"city\":\"Brighton\",\"county\":\"Livingston\",\"state\":\"MI\",\"zip\":48116,\"phone1\":\"810-292-9388\",\"phone2\":\"810-374-9840\",\"email\":\"josephine_darakjy@darakjy.org\",\"web\":\"http:\/\/www.chanayjeffreyaesq.com\"},{\"eid\":\"3\",\"first_name\":\"Art\",\"last_name\":\"Venere\",\"company_name\":\"Chemel, James L Cpa\",\"address\":\"8 W Cerritos Ave #54\",\"city\":\"Bridgeport\",\"county\":\"Gloucester\",\"state\":\"NJ\",\"zip\":8014,\"phone1\":\"856-636-8749\",\"phone2\":\"856-264-4130\",\"email\":\"art@venere.org\",\"web\":\"http:\/\/www.chemeljameslcpa.com\"},{\"eid\":\"4\",\"first_name\":\"Lenna\",\"last_name\":\"Paprocki\",\"company_name\":\"Feltz Printing Service\",\"address\":\"639 Main St\",\"city\":\"Anchorage\",\"county\":\"Anchorage\",\"state\":\"AK\",\"zip\":99501,\"phone1\":\"907-385-4412\",\"phone2\":\"907-921-2010\",\"email\":\"lpaprocki@hotmail.com\",\"web\":\"http:\/\/www.feltzprintingservice.com\"}]"}
